title: champion selection freezes
body: keeping loose elo points deal to freeze screen in champion selection thats really annoying please look into that and fix that bug also  as soon as i click in history matches bugs out the whole icons get giant and some  just dent show...i play in a mac computer... thanks pls fix that bug ,,I'm sick of loosing elo cause of that

replies.body: i always played in NA server i soon i transfer to oce that started. its been almost 2 weeks now thanks i really apreciated
